title.newValue: Microsoft Viva: Inline suggestions available while composing an email or meeting invitation in Outlook on the web

description.newValue:
While composing an email or a meeting invitation in Outlook on the web, users will see inline suggestions from Microsoft Viva Insights to help improve productivity and wellbeing. These complement the inline suggestions they already see while reading emails and meeting invites.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/viva/insights/personal/use/mya-notifications
GA date: July CY2022
